Uses of Package
net.sf.rcer.conn.tools

Packages that use net.sf.rcer.conn.tools
net.sf.rcer.conn.tools   
 

Classes in net.sf.rcer.conn.tools used by net.sf.rcer.conn.tools
DataType
          The data type of a field (see R/3 domain INTTYPE).
FieldNotFoundException
          This exception occurs whenever someone tries to access a table with RFC_READ_TABLE and requests a field that does not exist.
ITableContents
          The contents of a table as returned by RFC_READ_TABLE using the TableReader.
ITableField
          The description of a table field as used by RFC_READ_TABLE.
ITableLine
          The actual contents of a table line.
TableReader
          An encapsulation of the function module RFC_READ_TABLE that allows access to SAP R/3 database tables.
TableReaderBuffer
          An auxiliary class that can be used to keep a reusable set of TableReader instances for a JCoDestination.
